column4: my flash non free plugin is still running a little slow, and this websites menu, which normally works on windows, is broken snkneogeousaconsumer.com I see large gray errors over wherever flash would be until I click them then flash starts
you might want to look at getting the flash 10 prerelease
download this file, http://fpdownload.macromedia.com/get/flashplayer/current/install_flash_player_10_linux.tar.gz , and extract the file in the tar to /usr/lib/firefox-addons/plugins
